sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of cyber attack occurring on a network
message_1: What is the probability of a ransomware attack occurring on a network with 50 active computers given that the historical data shows that 20% of similar networks with 50 active computers have been affected by ransomware attacks in the past year?
message_2: The probability of a ransomware attack occurring on a network with 50 active computers, given the historical data, is 20%.
